The sequence should be: First, the anchor asks if he will appear in court and cooperate with police; second, Imran Khan responds that he had bail until the 18th but police arrived early with a massive force; third, he adds “Firstly” and says he faces 85 cases, asserting his actions were lawful; fourth, he explains he could not attend court due to bomb attacks and lack of security; fifth, he expresses fear of custodial torture and mentions bullet wounds from an assassination attempt; sixth, he recounts prior weekend arrest attempts and says he warned of an assassination plot; seventh, the feed later cuts to tense street scenes with smoke as the on-screen time advances to around 10:23–10:24 GMT.
